data.text: Only Donald Trump could (try to) divide the nation over a Super Bowl Half-time Show.  The man often boasts that he’s better at practically everything than anybody, anywhere.  Here’s where he is actually unrivaled: DIVISION!  When it comes to that, he is the undisputed champion!

Masked agents in the streets.
Cracking down on peaceful protests.
Entering homes without warrants.

The next step is seizing control of elections.

We have to stand up and say no.
Now is the time to speak up and speak out. https://t.co/Ii2dM81cgP

Millions lost health care so Washington Republicans could give their rich friends yet another tax cut.

Donald Trump and JD Vance think that's a win.

I think it's a moral tragedy.

They made ICE larger than all of the federal law enforcement agencies combined.

When you build a beast that large, it's got to eat.

And we're witnessing it eat and consume the bodies of ordinary citizens. It is out of control.

Yes… I saw the racist meme from the President of the United States.

The President is trying to summon our country’s darkest demons to further divide us.

Our nation's spiritual rot is coming from the White House.

I’m calling on all decent and honorable people to condemn this

The Trump-Vance regime majors in cruelty. We must fight this kind of vicious cruelty and its corrosive impact on the soul of our nation.
https://t.co/bBCVKRDyOr
They have concepts of a manufacturing boom. https://t.co/NW9sJVE4XU

I asked Scott Bessent how many manufacturing jobs we've lost since liberation day.

The answer: 72,000.

I would submit that it's a curious kind of freedom that leaves you unemployed. https://t.co/6UeP8h38Qw
